exercise.title: Parse Google News
exercise.name: parse_google_news
exercise.shortdescription: Scrape Google News Headlines with Python
exercise.description: Through Python libraries, scrape Google News for only the headlines of the day and output them to a text file.
exercise.tutorial:
1. Use Python to parse through Google News for only the headlines.
  2. After scraping the headlines, write them to a text file.
  3. Make sure the text file is readable and show to leadership.
  4. Email your code to the Adelphi Training Team at adelphi-training-team@googlegroups.com for code review. Use your N57 email.

question.text: Why is Python better than .NET, .VBS or Powershell?
question.answer: More efficient, more powerful set of libraries, etc. Just all around a bad ass programming language.

question.text: Take a screen shot of your code output and upload it.
